part.content: CHAPTER II : THE NATURE OF PARTNERSHIP. Sec. 4 - 8.
CHAPTER III : RELATIONS OF PARTNERS TO ONE ANOTHER. Sec. 9 - 17.
CHAPTER IV : RELATIONS OF PARTNERS TO THIRD PARTIES. Sec. 18 - 30.
CHAPTER V : INCOMING AND OUTGOING PARTNERS. Sec. 31 - 38.
CHAPTER VI : DISSOLUTION OF A FIRM. Sec. 39 - 55.
CHAPTER VII : REGISTRATION OF FIRMS. Sec. 56 - 71.
